title: need help ! pvp.net patcher Kernel has stopped working? what do i do

replies.body: This pesky error is usually caused by an issue with your OS or other setting that's preventing the patcher from launching.  Go over our [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to restore access and allow the game to launch and scan files.  This should get you in game!
